title: Mascarenhas (Manuel de Sousa)
body: He was appointed Governor and Captain-General of Madeira on February 27, 1645, and took office on April 11 of the same year. He was imprisoned by his successor Manuel LÃ´bo da Silva, following an order from the mainland government, as Manuel de Sousa Mascarenhas was accused of serious abuses in the exercise of the Governorship of this archipelago.
